attributes.action: We request a public vote before laws are changed on any of our free liberties
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to allow us a say in the way we live our own lives as free citizens of this country
attributes.background: We want us the citizens of the United Kingdom to be able to have a public vote on the laws that affect our freedom and civil liberties that will be life changing for our way of life and the way society operates.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want there to be public votes before certain laws are changed, but it's not clear what laws you want this to apply to. For example, the right to personal property could mean that referendums were required to all changes to tax.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
